message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: because you wanna get into a good college. and get like great money. cause you don't wanna sit around unemployed?. i hope ?.
Him: lol, ambition is sexy, but have you considered a career in professional meme creation? 💸

CONVERSATION 2
Her: because you wanna get into a good college. and get like great money. cause you don't wanna sit around unemployed?. i hope ?.
Him: Sure, but if I ace flirting 101, do I get extra credit? 😉

CONVERSATION 3
Her: because you wanna get into a good college. and get like great money. cause you don't wanna sit around unemployed?. i hope ?.
Him: Well, yeah, but my major in Netflix and chill isn’t paying off yet. lmao

CONVERSATION 4
Her: because you wanna get into a good college. and get like great money. cause you don't wanna sit around unemployed?. i hope ?.
Him: Haha, aiming for that CEO position, but like, of gaming... where do I sign up?

CONVERSATION 5
Her: because you wanna get into a good college. and get like great money. cause you don't wanna sit around unemployed?. i hope ?.
Him: Employment's cool and all, but have you heard of inheriting a fortune? Much easier. lol
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

        Here is the sample conversation-

        Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
        Him : yes yes yes. totally.

        An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

        CONVERSATION 1
        Her : im super wise wtf
        Him : of course, Socrates ;)
        ,

        CONVERSATION 2
        Her : im so smart
        Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

        I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

        I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

        Here is your prompt. 
        Her : Her : because you wanna get into a good college. and get like great money. cause you don't wanna sit around unemployed?. i hope ?.  
        Him : Him : ....... oh cmon. but why?. 

        Your Conversations must be of the format :
        CONVERSATION
        Her : 'message'
        Him : 'message'.

        I want just the conversations. No filler messages or content which AI usually gives.

        Thanks bro.
